Interface InterestBearing

All Known Implementing Classes:
InvestmentAccount
public interface InterestBearing
Interface for accounts that can earn interest. This interface provides methods to manage interest rates and apply interest to the account.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    double
    applyInterest()
    Calculates and applies interest to the account.
    double
    getInterestRate()
    Gets the current interest rate for the account.
    void
    setInterestRate(double rate)
    Sets the interest rate for the account.

  • Method Details

    • getInterestRate

      double getInterestRate()
      Gets the current interest rate for the account.
      Returns:
      the interest rate as a percentage (e.g., 2.5 for 2.5%).

    • setInterestRate

      void setInterestRate(double rate)
      Sets the interest rate for the account.
      Parameters:
      rate - the interest rate as a percentage.

    • applyInterest

      double applyInterest()
      Calculates and applies interest to the account.
      Returns:
      the amount of interest added to the account.
